text: Uye vanogovera Allah chidimbu chezvavanowana kubva muminda nemombe idzo dzavakasika, uye vanoti: “Izvi ndezva Allah zvichienderana nemafungiro avo, uye izvi ndezve shamwari dzedu (zvisikwa zvavanosanganisa naAllah). Asi chidimbu cheshamwari dzavo hachimbosviki kuna Allah; asi chidimbu chaAllah, chinosvika kune shamwari dzavo (vanamwari vavo)!” Nzira yavanotonga nayo ndiyo yakaipa
